Projects

Check some of my projects! ðŸ˜„ If you find something interesting, be sure to hit me up.

Quantum Machine Learning

With two great friends, Pietro Bonardi and Davide Badalotti, I developed a review and primer of modern Quantum Machine Learning.

We also tried to not only show the theoretical aspect of it, but some cool Python libraries which allow for simple QML techniques.

  • Paper

Advise Only

A financial consulting firm needed help to cluster costumers: we tried to use hierarchical clusterings and dimensionality projections to find valuable patterns and make them understandable.

Check out our slides (in Italian, sorry ðŸ˜”) and the project repo if you want. We also developed an App for it, which you can find in the repo below.

  • Slides
  • Github

How Tube Popular

Put together web scraping, distributed cloud computing and cool visualizations: that's what this project is all about.

Give a look at the repo, a paper about it and our cool visualization.

  • Github
  • Paper
  • Interactive Visualization

Just News

A state-of-the-art Natural Language Processing project. Like, really state of the art: the main technique used, called CADE, is a revolutionary method just published by a professor at Bicocca. ðŸ¤“

I have some slides and the repo on this one.
